app_description: Transform CURL commands into OpenAPI documentation compatible with Swagger UI. Add multiple responses and generate documentation automatically.
curl_input_placeholder:
Digite seu comando CURL aqui
Exemplo:
curl -X POST 'https://api.exemplo.com/v1/usuarios' 
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' 
-d '{
  "nome": "João Silva",
  "email": "joao.silva@exemplo.com"
}'
responses_description: Defina as diferentes respostas que seu endpoint pode retornar
